title.narrative: Uttar Pradesh Major District Roads Improvement Project

description.narrative: The project will improve about 430 kilometers (km) of major district roads (MDRs) in the state of Uttar Pradesh, in line with the Strategic Core Road Network Master Plan for Uttar Pradesh. It will involve upgrading of MDRs depending on traffic requirements; reconstruction, widening and strengthening of culverts and bridges; and maintenance of the improved road assets for 5 years after construction. The project will also conduct a road safety audit of the MDRs on the core road network (CRN) and initiate remedial measures at identified critical locations.

participating-org.narrative: Project Mngt. Unit, Government of Uttar Pradesh
Public Works Department, Government of Uttar Pradesh

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Efficiency and safety of road transport for people and goods in the state of Uttar Pradesh is improved

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Annual deaths from road accidents on the project roads reduced to fewer than 100 (2014 baseline: 109)

description.narrative: Efficiency and safety of road transport for people and goods in the state of Uttar Pradesh is improved

title.narrative: Average travel time on the project roads reduced by 25% (2015 baseline: 1.61 minutes per kilometer)

description.narrative: Efficiency and safety of road transport for people and goods in the state of Uttar Pradesh is improved

title.narrative: Movement of people and goods on rehabilitated roads measured by annual average daily traffic increased to 71,000 (2015 baseline: 53,400)

description.narrative: Efficiency and safety of road transport for people and goods in the state of Uttar Pradesh is improved

title.narrative: Vehicle operating cost (economic) on the project roads reduced by 25% (2015 baseline: Rs13 per km in the case of cars and Rs27 per km in the case of medium trucks)

description.narrative: Efficiency and safety of road transport for people and goods in the state of Uttar Pradesh is improved
